content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Sep 2019Can I hold multiple co-branded credit cards at the same time (e.g. UOB Krisflyer and AMEX Krisflyer)?Will I encounter any sort of issues?1 answerAnswerBump0

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 04 Sep 2019Short answer, yes.Case in point, I own both.It doesn't matter if you own multiple co-branded cards as it just means more channels for you to earn miles.0 comments0
